title: Gerry (Gus Van Sant, 2002)
description:
Two Men, both named "Gerry" are driving across California Desert to an unknown destination. Ensured to be reaching their destination soon, they decide to finish the trip by foot. But Gerry and Gerry can't seem to find what they were looking for ; they can't even find their car. 
With no food and no water, they're forced to walk deeper and deeper into the dry and silent Death Valley, endangering their lives and their friendship.


In our nowadays world, what does it actually mean to be lost ? Are there anyways to silently disappear without leaving any trace?

A movie with a gorgeous cinematography and a splendid soundtrack featuring Arvo Part masterpieces. 

Gus Van Sant delivers the first of his three movies from his "Death" Trilogy : Gerry, Elephant, Last Days. <a href="
